name: Sociology of Books
description: A sociological examination of the creation, production, dissemination, and reception of books.
prerequisites: 10.0 credits including SOCB05H3, and [1.0 credit from the following: SOCB30H3, SOCB42H3, SOCB43H3, SOCB47H3, SOCB44H3, SOCB58H3] or [10.0 credits including SOCB58H3 and enrolment in the Minor in Culture, Creativity and Cities]
